pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SMHI Swedish weather institute packagePython library for accessing SMHI open forecast dataPlease visit http://opendata.smhi.se/apidocs/metfcst/parameters.html for more informationIf you want to contribute you can use devcontainers in vscode for easiest setup. Please see [instructions here](.devcontainer/README.md)If you like what I do and want to buy me a cup of coffee. It is always appreciated :)
